DOC.brief_summary: Although Computed tomography (CT) is not routinely used to evaluate beast masses, It is common to discover Incidental breast lesions on chest CT. The goal of this study is to investigate the incidence and appearance of incidentally discovered breast masses on chest CT.
DOC.brief_title: Characterization of Breast Masses Incidentally Detected on Chest CT
DOC.criteria: Woman with incidentally discovered breast masses on chest CT Male gender Known breast cancer
